channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'What are you doing?': Lindsey Graham rips Republicans supporting Kamala Harris

item.title: Happy 60th Anniversary CAPM! Why the Capital Asset Pricing Model Still Matters
item.description: The CAPM has its critics. Yet, the model, introduced by Bill Sharpe in 1964, remains front and center in academia and in practice.

item.description: The House Task Force investigating the attempted assassinations of Donald Trump has released a 51-page interim report.

item.description: Should I add bitcoin to my portfolio? If not, why not? This book will help advisors field these tough client questions.

item.title: China’s Ambitions Are Endangering the Pacific Islands
item.description: The U.S. needs a new strategy to engage with the strategically essential region.

item.description: When drones swarmed our military bases, the only thing bureaucrats 'shot down' were proposals about how to deal with the problem.
